main event: Observers reported a dark, disc-shaped object moving very fast in Sacramento, California on July 2, 1952.
interesting points: The object was reported as having no sound., The object was visually observed from the ground with binoculars., At least one airplane passed over shortly before the object was observed., Observers reported seeing the object for a total of around 4 minutes., The object was described as being at an altitude of 5000 to 10,000 feet.
